name: Board Out Of Control
description:
This Is My first Game released and my participation for GMTK Jam 2020 .. 

Title : Board Out of Control ..

 - Warning : Don`t Play this Game in case You have heart problems or anger issues . 

- This Game is build in Two days due the participation in GMTK jam 2020 .

- This Game Can Drive You insane .. The control is crazy . 

- One man team .
